input.sentences: a host introduced a cool show on the stage
the first act was a gothic vocalist woman .
next a jazz saxophonist performed a cool song .
after | a man who eats fire performed some cool tricks .
the show ended with a big | silly dance routine .
output.sentences: The side show began with an introduction from the host, who juggled bowling pins very well.
Next, a gothic lady came on stage and began to sing an song.
After the song was over, the fire eater amazed us with his dangerous stunt.
The side show ended with a silly dance routine.
